intro: Choose the correct statement to add to the summary.

scorePerfect.title: Perfect
scorePerfect.message: Congratulations. You got everything correct on the first attempt.

scoreOver40.title: Ok
scoreOver40.message: There is still room for improvements.

scoreOver0.title: Not so good
scoreOver0.message: You need to work more on this subject.

summary: You selected @score of @total statements correct on the first attempt. That's @percent%.
